FuncDef: This command creates a port cross-connect (PXC) object. Referencing an Ethernet port within the PXC object will automatically configure this Ethernet port as a loopback port. The node will automatically create two PXC sub-ports under this Ethernet port. The configuration of PXC sub-ports can be accessed through the CLI.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the port cross-connect identifier. Values-1 to 64.
